abstract: Oracle reports higher-than-expected fiscal third-quarter profit of $2.14 billion, or 50 cents a share, and increased its stock buyback program by $10 billion.

headline.print_headline: Oracle Increases Buyback Program by $10 Billion
headline.main: Oracle Increases Buyback Program by $10 Billion

snippet: Oracle reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit.
lead_paragraph: Oracle reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit.
